CmdLine: echo 'deb http://www.rabbitmq.com/debian/ testing main'> /etc/apt/sources.list.d/rabbitmq.list &&     curl -s https://www.rabbitmq.com/rabbitmq-release-signing-key.asc | apt-key add - &&     apt-get -qq update &&     apt-get -qq -y install         rabbitmq-server &&     apt-get clean &&     rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* /tmp/* /var/tmp/* &&     mkdir -p /etc/service/rabbit &&     touch /etc/service/rabbit/run &&     mkdir -p /etc/service/rabbit-configure &&     touch /etc/service/rabbit-configure/run
Commands.Name: run
